nodes.text: Faddera Rabar was a Dyplotid who was part of Enfys Nest's Cloud-Riders.

Faddera Rabar was portrayed by Barbara Fadden in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was later identified in the Star Wars: Card Trader app. The character's name is a tuckerization of the actress' name.

A Dyplotid with a similar outfit appeared in the first episode of the 2019 television show The Mandalorian. However, no official source has confirmed if this is Rabar or another member of the species.
